title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using the Java editor in Photon, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler is not displayed as expected.
OB: When I open a java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, no popup menu is shown.
EB: When I open a java editor and right click on the left vertical ruler, a menu should be displayed that allows me to add breakpoints and marks.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1) Open a java editor. 
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. 
Expected behavior: A menu should pop-up that allows me to add breakpoints and marks.
